skills.rating: Hands on experience on EC2, S3, RDS

projects.name: Profiler
projects.description: Profiler shows user's profile with all the relevant information in an interactive way. User can create profiles by calling some APIs defined. User can insert/update/delete information just by sending JSON data to particular API
projects.technology: J2EE, Spring-Boot, React JS, Postgres, Swagger documentation, Git, AWS EC2, S3, RDS

projects.name: Voyager
projects.description: Voyager is a location based quiz game which will test your knowledge of different geographic locations,landscape across our country. You will be staring from one point and you will be travelling from one state to another by identifying photo and name of your next destination. Your progress will be marked on OpenStreet map.
projects.technology: Angular 8, OpenStreet Map with Leaflet library, Pixels API

projects.name: Where Is This Location
projects.description: Location based quiz app where you need to guess the location by seeing one image.
projects.technology: Angular 8, Node JS, ExpressJS, Pixels AP

projects.name: Country Food Quiz
projects.description: This is a food quiz app has been built on React , Spring Boot REST and PostgreSQL. Backend is incorporated with with admin security feature and admin controller APIs for managing quiz question bank
projects.technology: J2EE, Spring-Boot, React JS, Postgres, Git, Heroku Service

projects.name: Westlaw - Alert module
projects.description: Westlaw is an online legal research service and proprietary database for lawyers and legal professionals. It handles significant amount of court, keycite, legal information. This application has been built with Cobalt Framework which developed by in house developers and built on top of many technologies like Java-Spring framework, python, DotNet etc. Alert module is a sub-module of the entire module set for this application. Her user can create alert with specific criteries and when alert module find some data matches those criteria, delivers information in form of RSS, mail or downloadable format to user.
projects.technology: J2EE, Spring, Git, AzureDevOps, Veracode, SonarQube

projects.name: NextGen Workorder Management System
projects.description: SES Platform is a multi-utility, multi-client platform that significantly reduces cost and risk while improving deployment and meter operations. A fully integrated solution, it features one application with seven modules. Developed web based solution with microservices with live push notification support. Developed modular frontend using Angular 7. Deployed microservices with Docker container. Also worked for CI/CD implementations.

projects.name: Adaptation Acceleration Engine (AAE)
projects.description: Adaptation Acceleration Engine (AAE) is a Cisco technology support service to maximize their collaboration investments. The purpose of AASC is to capture data and upload to the central Hadoop environment for further assurance and analytic services. Developed RESTful services, integrated Python code for business logics

projects.name: Business continuity management (BCM)
projects.description: Business continuity management (BCM) is designed to ensure continuity of critical services being provided to customers in situations of events causing significant impact to business continuity. The primary objective of this application is to lay down the Business Continuity Plan to ensure recovery of essential elements (Infrastructure, Services & Devices) under various scenarios, necessary to support the continuity and/or resumption of mission critical business processes for business process owners.
